overview: It was the early 1930's and St. Paul, Minnesota had a system which allowed criminals free reign. Alvin "Creepy Karpis", Edna Murray "The Kissing Bandit", the Barker boys and John Dillinger are among those who look back on their own careers, telling how they made money the old fashioned way ... by stealing it.
tagline: Criminals need a place they can call home too
title: Gangsterland
